location: Undercity Level 9 - Sector 7 (old casino), Sector 4 (Jax's squat)

knows: He's Gamma caste, genetically barred from upper levels
Biometric scanners read DNA and enforce caste boundaries
Drift is addictive but provides chemical relief
SSS is hunting him for dealing
Deep sections of old city exist, scavengers supposedly find things there
Jax Varro.emotional_state: Wary, exhausted, resigned to his place but with underlying anger and longing
Jax Varro.physical_state: Exhausted from chase, under influence of Drift

revealed_to_reader: Biometric caste system enforced by DNA scanning
Three castes: Alpha (pure DNA), Beta (minimal mods), Gamma (labor mods)
Level 9 (undercity) is abandoned by station authority
Drift drug - painkiller designed for Gammas, highly addictive
SSS (Station Security Services) enforces caste boundaries
Art deco architecture of old station
Jax is a small-time Drift dealer
Jax reads old Earth noir novels
Setting is Orbital Station Meridian-9 around Saturn
Genetic modifications were done to ancestors 200 years ago

planted.element: Deep old city sections beyond Level 9
planted.significance: Where the vault will be found

planted.element: Scavengers finding valuable things in deep sections
planted.significance: The dying scavenger who gives Jax directions

planted.element: Jax's intelligence hidden under survival mode (reads Hammett, Chandler)
planted.significance: Character depth, shows he's more than just a dealer

planted.element: Old casino and entertainment district ruins
planted.significance: World building, shows what was lost

active_tensions: Jax hunted by SSS for dealing
Longing for freedom he can't have
